discourse_list.title: Avoiding the Tragedy: ACREinvest Delegate Office Hours

content.content: My name is Kianga Daverington, I am the Founder of ACREinvest and have been a Recognized Delegate at MakerDAO since December 2021. I will hold open “Office Hours” on Monday, June 20th at 3pm EST | 7pm UTC for any members of the community to attend and ask me anything (AMA). See zoom info below. The call will not be recorded. At ACREinvest we seek to regenerate the way global capital markets work and for whom. We are drawn to serve the MakerDAO community because the MKR ecosystem has the potential to be the most powerful lever in all of decentralized finance for the benefit of humanity and world. And not just DeFi,  All-Fi! My individual mission is to participate in transitioning our world system from one that enslaves humanity by virtue of a variety of corrupt, clandestine, illegitimate and exploitive tactics to one that is honest, transparent, trustworthy and regenerative. Accordingly, ACREinvest values core crypto principles of decentralization, transparency, consensus, cooperation, liberty and privacy. Nation states rise and fall, but freedom is an intangible we must insist upon for humanity in whatever system emerges from our Current Struggle. Without a medium of exchange and stable store of value that is freely available to be held and used permissionlessly and privately by all who would work for it honestly, there can be no liberty. Many of you know that I’m a lawyer admitted to practice in New York State, USA. I graduated from Yale Law School in 1998. I value the rule of law. I stand with laws that serve humanity and not the other way around. Never forget that we are the authors of our laws. When laws become corrupt and destructive, we must change them in legitimate ways that are open, and that follow the consensus established for how such rules may be changed. Any new consensus must be honestly won to be sustainable. In our service to MakerDAO, ACREinvest supports accelerating decentralization in a way that does not promote lawlessness and illegitimate use within the protocol, social or governance layers. I welcome the opportunity to devote more time and focus to this community according to how you decide governance should evolve, and invite your feedback at this meeting or at future Office Hours. “Without common ideas, there is no common action, and without common action men still exist, but a social body does not. Thus in order that there be society, and all the more, that this society prosper, it is necessary that all the minds of the citizens always be brought together and held together by some principle ideas” ― Alexis de Tocqueville, Democracy in America Kianga Daverington is inviting you to a scheduled Zoom meeting. Topic: ACREinvest MKR Recognized Delegate AMA Time: Jun 20, 2022 03:00 PM Eastern Time (US and Canada) Join Zoom Meeting   Zoom Video   Join our Cloud HD Video Meeting Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference...      Meeting ID: 862 8864 6632 Passcode: 402642 One tap mobile +19292056099,86288646632#,*402642# US (New York) +13017158592,86288646632#,*402642# US (Washington DC) Dial by your location +1 929 205 6099 US (New York) +1 301 715 8592 US (Washington DC) +1 312 626 6799 US (Chicago) +1 346 248 7799 US (Houston) +1 669 900 6833 US (San Jose) +1 253 215 8782 US (Tacoma) Meeting ID: 862 8864 6632 Passcode: 402642 Find your local number: Zoom International Dial-in Numbers - Zoom For more about the firm and my role see our comments here: How Many Delegates Do This As Their Job? - #20 by ACREinvest
content.GPT-summary: Kianga Daverington, the founder of ACREinvest and a recognized delegate at MakerDAO, is holding an "Office Hours" session to answer questions from the community. ACREinvest aims to regenerate global capital markets and values core crypto principles of decentralization, transparency, consensus, cooperation, liberty, and privacy. Kianga invites feedback from the community on how governance should evolve. The post does not advertise the proposal, nor does it contain entirely positive or negative feedback.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: The next ACREinvest Delegate Office Hours will take place on Wed, July 6 at 15:00 EST | 19:00 UTC and the topic of discussion will be our MIP55 proposal MIP55c3-SP5: Interim Chief Legal Officer THIS ZOOM SESSION WILL BE RECORDED AND MADE AVAILABLE FOR LATER VIEWING ON THE ACRE OF AMERICA YOUTUBE CHANNEL Kianga Daverington is inviting you to a scheduled Zoom meeting. content.content: This call is at 3pm EST today… about 4 hours from now. I see a few folks joining and leaving the zoom room, so not sure if there’s conflicting information somewhere that the call is now. Hope to see you later today!

content.content: Thank you to the community members who joined today’s Office Hours! The video has been posted on our Delegate Platform and Interim Chief Legal Officer forum thread. We will hold another in about two weeks or so, and before the Frozen Period on the Mip55 proposal. MIP55c3-SP5: Interim Chief Legal Officer - #66 by ACREinvest

content.content: This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
